body_content.explanation: a situation in which agreement in an argument cannot be reached because neither side will change its demands or accept any of the demands of the other side:
examples: Somebody will have to compromise if we are to break (= end) the deadlock between the two warring factions.
Once again the talks have ended in deadlock.
Deadlock over wage levels has prevented an agreement being reached.

body_content.explanation: a lock that is inside the edge of a door, so that it cannot be seen or removed when the door is closed
